AddRoleToDBCluster.name: AddRoleToDBCluster
AddRoleToDBCluster.description:
Grants permission to associate an Identity and Access Management (IAM) role from an
                                                Aurora DB cluster

AddRoleToDBInstance.name: AddRoleToDBInstance
AddRoleToDBInstance.description:
Grants permission to associate an AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role with
                                                a DB instance

AddSourceIdentifierToSubscription.name: AddSourceIdentifierToSubscription
AddSourceIdentifierToSubscription.description:
Grants permission to add a source identifier to an existing RDS event notification
                                                subscription

AddTagsToResource.name: AddTagsToResource
AddTagsToResource.description: Grants permission to add metadata tags to an Amazon RDS resource

ApplyPendingMaintenanceAction.name: ApplyPendingMaintenanceAction
ApplyPendingMaintenanceAction.description: Grants permission to apply a pending maintenance action to a resource

AuthorizeDBSecurityGroupIngress.name: AuthorizeDBSecurityGroupIngress
AuthorizeDBSecurityGroupIngress.description:
Grants permission to enable ingress to a DBSecurityGroup using one of two forms of
                                                authorization

BacktrackDBCluster.name: BacktrackDBCluster
BacktrackDBCluster.description:
Grants permission to backtrack a DB cluster to a specific time, without creating a
                                                new DB cluster

CancelExportTask.name: CancelExportTask
CancelExportTask.description: Grants permission to cancel an export task in progress

CopyDBClusterParameterGroup.name: CopyDBClusterParameterGroup
CopyDBClusterParameterGroup.description: Grants permission to copy the specified DB cluster parameter group

CopyDBClusterSnapshot.name: CopyDBClusterSnapshot
CopyDBClusterSnapshot.description: Grants permission to create a snapshot of a DB cluster

CopyDBParameterGroup.name: CopyDBParameterGroup
CopyDBParameterGroup.description: Grants permission to copy the specified DB parameter group

CopyDBSnapshot.name: CopyDBSnapshot
CopyDBSnapshot.description: Grants permission to copy the specified DB snapshot

CopyOptionGroup.name: CopyOptionGroup
CopyOptionGroup.description: Grants permission to copy the specified option group

CreateDBCluster.name: CreateDBCluster
CreateDBCluster.description: Grants permission to create a new Amazon Aurora DB cluster

CreateDBClusterEndpoint.name: CreateDBClusterEndpoint
CreateDBClusterEndpoint.description:
Grants permission to create a new custom endpoint and associates it with an Amazon
                                                Aurora DB cluster

CreateDBClusterParameterGroup.name: CreateDBClusterParameterGroup
CreateDBClusterParameterGroup.description: Grants permission to create a new DB cluster parameter group

CreateDBClusterSnapshot.name: CreateDBClusterSnapshot
CreateDBClusterSnapshot.description: Grants permission to create a snapshot of a DB cluster

CreateDBInstance.name: CreateDBInstance
CreateDBInstance.description: Grants permission to create a new DB instance

CreateDBInstanceReadReplica.name: CreateDBInstanceReadReplica
CreateDBInstanceReadReplica.description:
Grants permission to create a DB instance that acts as a Read Replica of a source
                                                DB instance

CreateDBParameterGroup.name: CreateDBParameterGroup
CreateDBParameterGroup.description: Grants permission to create a new DB parameter group

CreateDBProxy.name: CreateDBProxy
CreateDBProxy.description: Grants permission to create a database proxy

CreateDBSecurityGroup.name: CreateDBSecurityGroup
CreateDBSecurityGroup.description:
Grants permission to create a new DB security group. DB security groups control access
                                                to a DB instance

CreateDBSnapshot.name: CreateDBSnapshot
CreateDBSnapshot.description: Grants permission to create a DBSnapshot

CreateDBSubnetGroup.name: CreateDBSubnetGroup
CreateDBSubnetGroup.description: Grants permission to create a new DB subnet group

CreateEventSubscription.name: CreateEventSubscription
CreateEventSubscription.description: Grants permission to create an RDS event notification subscription

CreateGlobalCluster.name: CreateGlobalCluster
CreateGlobalCluster.description: Grants permission to create an Aurora global database spread across multiple regions

CreateOptionGroup.name: CreateOptionGroup
CreateOptionGroup.description: Grants permission to create a new option group

CrossRegionCommunication.name: CrossRegionCommunication
CrossRegionCommunication.description:
Grants permission to access a resource in the remote Region when executing cross-Region
                                                operations, such as cross-Region snapshot copy or cross-Region read replica creation

DeleteDBCluster.name: DeleteDBCluster
DeleteDBCluster.description: Grants permission to delete a previously provisioned DB cluster

DeleteDBClusterEndpoint.name: DeleteDBClusterEndpoint
DeleteDBClusterEndpoint.description:
Grants permission to delete a custom endpoint and removes it from an Amazon Aurora
                                                DB cluster

DeleteDBClusterParameterGroup.name: DeleteDBClusterParameterGroup
DeleteDBClusterParameterGroup.description: Grants permission to delete a specified DB cluster parameter group

DeleteDBClusterSnapshot.name: DeleteDBClusterSnapshot
DeleteDBClusterSnapshot.description: Grants permission to delete a DB cluster snapshot

DeleteDBInstance.name: DeleteDBInstance
DeleteDBInstance.description: Grants permission to delete a previously provisioned DB instance

DeleteDBInstanceAutomatedBackup.name: DeleteDBInstanceAutomatedBackup
DeleteDBInstanceAutomatedBackup.description:
Grants permission to deletes automated backups based on the source instance's DbiResourceId
                                                value or the restorable instance's resource ID

DeleteDBParameterGroup.name: DeleteDBParameterGroup
DeleteDBParameterGroup.description: Grants permission to delete a specified DBParameterGroup

DeleteDBProxy.name: DeleteDBProxy
DeleteDBProxy.description: Grants permission to delete a database proxy

DeleteDBSecurityGroup.name: DeleteDBSecurityGroup
DeleteDBSecurityGroup.description: Grants permission to delete a DB security group

DeleteDBSnapshot.name: DeleteDBSnapshot
DeleteDBSnapshot.description: Grants permission to delete a DBSnapshot

DeleteDBSubnetGroup.name: DeleteDBSubnetGroup
DeleteDBSubnetGroup.description: Grants permission to delete a DB subnet group

DeleteEventSubscription.name: DeleteEventSubscription
DeleteEventSubscription.description: Grants permission to delete an RDS event notification subscription

DeleteGlobalCluster.name: DeleteGlobalCluster
DeleteGlobalCluster.description: Grants permission to delete a global database cluster

DeleteOptionGroup.name: DeleteOptionGroup
DeleteOptionGroup.description: Grants permission to delete an existing option group

DeregisterDBProxyTargets.name: DeregisterDBProxyTargets
DeregisterDBProxyTargets.description: Grants permission to remove targets from a database proxy target group

DescribeAccountAttributes.name: DescribeAccountAttributes
DescribeAccountAttributes.description: Grants permission to list all of the attributes for a customer account

DescribeCertificates.name: DescribeCertificates
DescribeCertificates.description: Lists the set of CA certificates provided by Amazon RDS for this AWS account

DescribeDBClusterBacktracks.name: DescribeDBClusterBacktracks
DescribeDBClusterBacktracks.description: Grants permission to return information about backtracks for a DB cluster

DescribeDBClusterEndpoints.name: DescribeDBClusterEndpoints
DescribeDBClusterEndpoints.description: Grants permission to return information about endpoints for an Amazon Aurora DB cluster

DescribeDBClusterParameterGroups.name: DescribeDBClusterParameterGroups
DescribeDBClusterParameterGroups.description: Grants permission to return a list of DBClusterParameterGroup descriptions

DescribeDBClusterParameters.name: DescribeDBClusterParameters
DescribeDBClusterParameters.description:
Grants permission to return the detailed parameter list for a particular DB cluster
                                                parameter group

DescribeDBClusterSnapshotAttributes.name: DescribeDBClusterSnapshotAttributes
DescribeDBClusterSnapshotAttributes.description:
Grants permission to return a list of DB cluster snapshot attribute names and values
                                                for a manual DB cluster snapshot

DescribeDBClusterSnapshots.name: DescribeDBClusterSnapshots
DescribeDBClusterSnapshots.description: Grants permission to return information about DB cluster snapshots

DescribeDBClusters.name: DescribeDBClusters
DescribeDBClusters.description: Grants permission to return information about provisioned Aurora DB clusters

DescribeDBEngineVersions.name: DescribeDBEngineVersions
DescribeDBEngineVersions.description: Grants permission to return a list of the available DB engines

DescribeDBInstanceAutomatedBackups.name: DescribeDBInstanceAutomatedBackups
DescribeDBInstanceAutomatedBackups.description:
Grants permission to return a list of automated backups for both current and deleted
                                                instances

DescribeDBInstances.name: DescribeDBInstances
DescribeDBInstances.description: Grants permission to return information about provisioned RDS instances

DescribeDBLogFiles.name: DescribeDBLogFiles
DescribeDBLogFiles.description: Grants permission to return a list of DB log files for the DB instance

DescribeDBParameterGroups.name: DescribeDBParameterGroups
DescribeDBParameterGroups.description: Grants permission to return a list of DBParameterGroup descriptions

DescribeDBParameters.name: DescribeDBParameters
DescribeDBParameters.description:
Grants permission to return the detailed parameter list for a particular DB parameter
                                                group

DescribeDBProxyTargetGroups.name: DescribeDBProxyTargetGroups
DescribeDBProxyTargetGroups.description: Grants permission to view database proxy target group details

DescribeDBProxyTargets.name: DescribeDBProxyTargets
DescribeDBProxyTargets.description: Grants permission to view database proxy target details

DescribeDBSecurityGroups.name: DescribeDBSecurityGroups
DescribeDBSecurityGroups.description: Grants permission to return a list of DBSecurityGroup descriptions

DescribeDBSnapshotAttributes.name: DescribeDBSnapshotAttributes
DescribeDBSnapshotAttributes.description:
Grants permission to return a list of DB snapshot attribute names and values for a
                                                manual DB snapshot

DescribeDBSnapshots.name: DescribeDBSnapshots
DescribeDBSnapshots.description: Grants permission to return information about DB snapshots

DescribeDBSubnetGroups.name: DescribeDBSubnetGroups
DescribeDBSubnetGroups.description: Grants permission to return a list of DBSubnetGroup descriptions

DescribeEngineDefaultClusterParameters.name: DescribeEngineDefaultClusterParameters
DescribeEngineDefaultClusterParameters.description:
Grants permission to return the default engine and system parameter information for
                                                the cluster database engine

DescribeEngineDefaultParameters.name: DescribeEngineDefaultParameters
DescribeEngineDefaultParameters.description:
Grants permission to return the default engine and system parameter information for
                                                the specified database engine

DescribeEventCategories.name: DescribeEventCategories
DescribeEventCategories.description:
Grants permission to display a list of categories for all event source types, or,
                                                if specified, for a specified source type

DescribeEventSubscriptions.name: DescribeEventSubscriptions
DescribeEventSubscriptions.description: Grants permission to list all the subscription descriptions for a customer account

DescribeEvents.name: DescribeEvents
DescribeEvents.description:
Grants permission to return events related to DB instances, DB security groups, DB
                                                snapshots, and DB parameter groups for the past 14 days

DescribeExportTasks.name: DescribeExportTasks
DescribeExportTasks.description: Grants permission to return information about the export tasks

DescribeGlobalClusters.name: DescribeGlobalClusters
DescribeGlobalClusters.description: Grants permission to return information about Aurora global database clusters

DescribeOptionGroupOptions.name: DescribeOptionGroupOptions
DescribeOptionGroupOptions.description: Grants permission to describe all available options

DescribeOptionGroups.name: DescribeOptionGroups
DescribeOptionGroups.description: Grants permission to describe the available option groups

DescribeOrderableDBInstanceOptions.name: DescribeOrderableDBInstanceOptions
DescribeOrderableDBInstanceOptions.description:
Grants permission to return a list of orderable DB instance options for the specified
                                                engine

DescribePendingMaintenanceActions.name: DescribePendingMaintenanceActions
DescribePendingMaintenanceActions.description:
Grants permission to return a list of resources (for example, DB instances) that have
                                                at least one pending maintenance action

DescribeReservedDBInstances.name: DescribeReservedDBInstances
DescribeReservedDBInstances.description:
Grants permission to return information about reserved DB instances for this account,
                                                or about a specified reserved DB instance

DescribeReservedDBInstancesOfferings.name: DescribeReservedDBInstancesOfferings
DescribeReservedDBInstancesOfferings.description: Grants permission to list available reserved DB instance offerings

DescribeSourceRegions.name: DescribeSourceRegions
DescribeSourceRegions.description:
Grants permission to return a list of the source AWS Regions where the current AWS
                                                Region can create a Read Replica or copy a DB snapshot from

DescribeValidDBInstanceModifications.name: DescribeValidDBInstanceModifications
DescribeValidDBInstanceModifications.description: Grants permission to list available modifications you can make to your DB instance

DownloadDBLogFilePortion.name: DownloadDBLogFilePortion
DownloadDBLogFilePortion.description:
Grants permission to download all or a portion of the specified log file, up to 1
                                                MB in size

FailoverDBCluster.name: FailoverDBCluster
FailoverDBCluster.description: Grants permission to force a failover for a DB cluster

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list all tags on an Amazon RDS resource

ModifyCurrentDBClusterCapacity.name: ModifyCurrentDBClusterCapacity
ModifyCurrentDBClusterCapacity.description:
Grants permission to modify current cluster capacity for an Amazon Aurora Severless
                                                DB cluster

ModifyDBCluster.name: ModifyDBCluster
ModifyDBCluster.description: Grants permission to modify a setting for an Amazon Aurora DB cluster

ModifyDBClusterEndpoint.name: ModifyDBClusterEndpoint
ModifyDBClusterEndpoint.description: Grants permission to modify the properties of an endpoint in an Amazon Aurora DB cluster

ModifyDBClusterParameterGroup.name: ModifyDBClusterParameterGroup
ModifyDBClusterParameterGroup.description: Grants permission to modify the parameters of a DB cluster parameter group

ModifyDBClusterSnapshotAttribute.name: ModifyDBClusterSnapshotAttribute
ModifyDBClusterSnapshotAttribute.description:
Grants permission to add an attribute and values to, or removes an attribute and values
                                                from, a manual DB cluster snapshot

ModifyDBInstance.name: ModifyDBInstance
ModifyDBInstance.description: Grants permission to modify settings for a DB instance

ModifyDBParameterGroup.name: ModifyDBParameterGroup
ModifyDBParameterGroup.description: Grants permission to modify the parameters of a DB parameter group

ModifyDBProxy.name: ModifyDBProxy
ModifyDBProxy.description: Grants permission to modify database proxy

ModifyDBProxyTargetGroup.name: ModifyDBProxyTargetGroup
ModifyDBProxyTargetGroup.description: Grants permission to modify target group for a database proxy

ModifyDBSnapshot.name: ModifyDBSnapshot
ModifyDBSnapshot.description:
Grants permission to update a manual DB snapshot, which can be encrypted or not encrypted,
                                                with a new engine version

ModifyDBSnapshotAttribute.name: ModifyDBSnapshotAttribute
ModifyDBSnapshotAttribute.description:
Grants permission to add an attribute and values to, or removes an attribute and values
                                                from, a manual DB snapshot

ModifyDBSubnetGroup.name: ModifyDBSubnetGroup
ModifyDBSubnetGroup.description: Grants permission to modify an existing DB subnet group

ModifyEventSubscription.name: ModifyEventSubscription
ModifyEventSubscription.description: Grants permission to modify an existing RDS event notification subscription

ModifyGlobalCluster.name: ModifyGlobalCluster
ModifyGlobalCluster.description: Grants permission to modify a setting for an Amazon Aurora global cluster

ModifyOptionGroup.name: ModifyOptionGroup
ModifyOptionGroup.description: Grants permission to modify an existing option group

PromoteReadReplica.name: PromoteReadReplica
PromoteReadReplica.description: Grants permission to promote a Read Replica DB instance to a standalone DB instance

PromoteReadReplicaDBCluster.name: PromoteReadReplicaDBCluster
PromoteReadReplicaDBCluster.description: Grants permission to promote a Read Replica DB cluster to a standalone DB cluster

PurchaseReservedDBInstancesOffering.name: PurchaseReservedDBInstancesOffering
PurchaseReservedDBInstancesOffering.description: Grants permission to purchase a reserved DB instance offering

RebootDBInstance.name: RebootDBInstance
RebootDBInstance.description: Grants permission to restart the database engine service

RegisterDBProxyTargets.name: RegisterDBProxyTargets
RegisterDBProxyTargets.description: Grants permission to add targets to a database proxy target group

RemoveFromGlobalCluster.name: RemoveFromGlobalCluster
RemoveFromGlobalCluster.description:
Grants permission to detach an Aurora secondary cluster from an Aurora global database
                                                cluster

RemoveRoleFromDBCluster.name: RemoveRoleFromDBCluster
RemoveRoleFromDBCluster.description:
Grants permission to disassociate an AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role
                                                from an Amazon Aurora DB cluster

RemoveRoleFromDBInstance.name: RemoveRoleFromDBInstance
RemoveRoleFromDBInstance.description:
Grants permission to disassociate an AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role
                                                from a DB instance

RemoveSourceIdentifierFromSubscription.name: RemoveSourceIdentifierFromSubscription
RemoveSourceIdentifierFromSubscription.description:
Grants permission to remove a source identifier from an existing RDS event notification
                                                subscription

RemoveTagsFromResource.name: RemoveTagsFromResource
RemoveTagsFromResource.description: Grants permission to remove metadata tags from an Amazon RDS resource

ResetDBClusterParameterGroup.name: ResetDBClusterParameterGroup
ResetDBClusterParameterGroup.description:
Grants permission to modify the parameters of a DB cluster parameter group to the
                                                default value

ResetDBParameterGroup.name: ResetDBParameterGroup
ResetDBParameterGroup.description:
Grants permission to modify the parameters of a DB parameter group to the engine/system
                                                default value

RestoreDBClusterFromS3.name: RestoreDBClusterFromS3
RestoreDBClusterFromS3.description:
Grants permission to create an Amazon Aurora DB cluster from data stored in an Amazon
                                                S3 bucket

RestoreDBClusterFromSnapshot.name: RestoreDBClusterFromSnapshot
RestoreDBClusterFromSnapshot.description: Grants permission to create a new DB cluster from a DB cluster snapshot

RestoreDBClusterToPointInTime.name: RestoreDBClusterToPointInTime
RestoreDBClusterToPointInTime.description: Grants permission to restore a DB cluster to an arbitrary point in time

RestoreDBInstanceFromDBSnapshot.name: RestoreDBInstanceFromDBSnapshot
RestoreDBInstanceFromDBSnapshot.description: Grants permission to create a new DB instance from a DB snapshot

RestoreDBInstanceFromS3.name: RestoreDBInstanceFromS3
RestoreDBInstanceFromS3.description: Grants permission to create a new DB instance from an Amazon S3 bucket

RestoreDBInstanceToPointInTime.name: RestoreDBInstanceToPointInTime
RestoreDBInstanceToPointInTime.description: Grants permission to restore a DB instance to an arbitrary point in time

RevokeDBSecurityGroupIngress.name: RevokeDBSecurityGroupIngress
RevokeDBSecurityGroupIngress.description:
Grants permission to revoke ingress from a DBSecurityGroup for previously authorized
                                                IP ranges or EC2 or VPC Security Groups

StartActivityStream.name: StartActivityStream
StartActivityStream.description: Grants permission to start Activity Stream

StartDBInstance.name: StartDBInstance
StartDBInstance.description: Grants permission to start the DB instance

StartExportTask.name: StartExportTask
StartExportTask.description: Grants permission to start a new Export task for a DB snapshot

StopActivityStream.name: StopActivityStream
StopActivityStream.description: Grants permission to stop Activity Stream

StopDBCluster.name: StopDBCluster
StopDBCluster.description: Grants permission to stop the DB cluster

StopDBInstance.name: StopDBInstance
StopDBInstance.description: Grants permission to stop the DB instance
